title: CERIUM OXIDE ABRASIVE PARTICLES AND POLISHING SLURRY COMPOSITION

samples.experiment_context: Synthesis with 0.1 M Ce(III) precursor, 0.05 M PEG (MW 600), 0.3 M NH4OH, 900 rpm stirring for 4h. Slurry: 0.1 wt% ceria, pH 5 (acetic acid).
